about_the_game:
10 tracks of the original music of Findig Teddy composed by Julien Rocca.

Track List:


1. Room
2. Teaser
3. Leaves and Grass
4. Shadows
5. Tarant
6. Cavern
7. Lac
8. City
9. Rain
10. Grey


The Soundtrack will be placed in your Findng Teddy folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\steamapps\common\FindingTeddy[/i]
